5. Ensure that your diet includes plenty of plant-based foods, such as fruits, vegetables, whole grains, and healthy fats, to provide fiber, vitamins, minerals, and antioxidants.

By focusing on a balanced and varied diet, and being mindful of portion sizes and cooking methods, you can enjoy the nutritional benefits of red meat while minimizing potential risks.
